remarks: Lemma for strong state theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
strlem3.1 $e |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
strlem3.2 $e |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) $.
strlem3.3 $e |- A e. CH $.
strlem3.4 $e |- B e. CH $.
strlem4 $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` A ) = 1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
$d u x $.
